mapper.select: /* sys.CodeCache.getDetail */ SELECT COMPCD , CODEKEY , NAME , EDITABLE , TABLENAME , REMARK , ADDUSERCD , CONVERT(VARCHAR, ADDDATETIME, 20) AS ADDDATETIME , UPDUSERCD , CONVERT(VARCHAR, UPDDATETIME, 20) AS UPDDATETIME , TERMINALCD FROM S001 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMPCD = #{COMPCD} AND CODEKEY = #{CODEKEY}

/* sys.CodeCache.getDetailList */ SELECT COMPCD , CODEKEY , CODE , SNAME1 , SNAME2 , SNAME3 , SNAME4 , SNAME5 , SORTNO , REMARK , STATUS FROM S002 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMPCD = #{COMPCD} AND CODEKEY = #{CODEKEY} ORDER BY SORTNO, CODE

/* sys.CodeCache.getDetailList2 */ SELECT COMPCD , CODEKEY , CODE , SNAME1 , SNAME2 , SNAME3 , SNAME4 , SNAME5 , SORTNO , REMARK , STATUS FROM S002 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE COMPCD = #{COMPCD} AND CODEKEY = #{CODEKEY} AND CODE = #{CODE} ORDER BY SORTNO, CODE
